Row
-----------------------------------------------------

### Inventory {.no-title}

```{r}
x <- filter(ts_data, product == p)
y <- filter(df_fc_data_combo, product == p) |> 
    mutate(.model = "A_Fcast")
z <- filter(df_fc_data_ind, product == p)

plotly_fable(
    x, 
    y = dose_quantity, 
    combo = y, 
    mods = z, 
    title = paste("Product: ", p), 
    ytitle = "Quantity",
    width = NULL,
    height = NULL
)
```

> Click on the model name to display or hide it on the graph.
